scene.name: intro
scene.option: How'd you come to be with these people?
What do you like to do?

scene.name: dog-history
scene.option: I bet you were pretty wild when you were younger.
Nah, I know. You probably met on a farm or something.

scene.name: younger
scene.option: When I'm old like you, I'll still be wild.

scene.name: farm
scene.option: I bet the old man herded sheep.
I bet the lady fixed tractors.

scene.name: rabbits
scene.option: Sure, so do me and Julian. We always let them go, though.
Nah, you're too slow. I like you anyway.

scene.name: lay-around
scene.option: Well, I bet you were pretty wild when you were younger.
Julian too. He sleeps all day.
